I feel like everything good in my life is slowly begining to decay and fall apart.  It's depressing the hell out of me.  I feel sick.  Things are changing and it scares me alot.  

I need serenity.
Security.
Peace of mind.
A sense of belonging.
Appreciation.
Companionship.

I need absense of self.

;Steve

Imagine..

Your driving down a long rural road in the middle of nowhere.  Nothing is around except farm land... you can see the horizon.  Its the type of place where your actions have ABSOLUTELY no consequences.  

Beautiful.

As your driving you see an object in the road... as you approach closer and closer you realize that it's not an object, but rather, a small animal.  Probably a dog.  But before you can hit the breaks you run the animal over.  You know that you have killed it instantly.  You feel the thump while going 80 mph over top of it.  

Do you stop the car to check on it?

Or do you keep going?

You know for a fact that the dog is dead.  There is nothing you can do to bring it back to life, so why even bother checking on it?  All you would be doing is mourning the loss of a fucking dog that you had never seen before up untill now.  

Now imagine the same scenerio, only its not a dog this time.  It's a hitchiker.  An actual human being.  Living, breathing, just like you. 

Is it the same?  
Are your actions still the same?
Are you still the same weak, walking ball of human emotions?

Now take this lesson and put it into prespective with your everyday life.

Your welcome.

<hr>

She's lost in coma where it's beautiful
intoxicated from the deep sleep, deep sleep
do you wonder what it's like
living in a permanent imagination?
sleeping to escape reality, but you like it like that

[Chorus:]
guilty by design 
she's nothing more then fiction. 
she dreams in digital, 
cause it's better then nothing. 
now that control is gone, 
it seems unreal, 
she's dreaming in digital. 
she dreams in digital.

and your pixel army can't save you now
my finger's on the kill switch
i remember i used to compose your dreams
control your dreams
and don't be afraid to expose yourself
before i shut you down
you made some changes since the virus caught you sleeping

[Chorus]

<i>Steve-0
<b>Stop thinking and fucking DO something!

Tonight..

I have seen the eyes of my inner most demons for all they are worth. 
I have walked down the stray corridor of shame and hit myself in the ass with each passing door.  
Then I had a sandwich.
Red paint on my hands, it represents blood.
Because tonight I died and was again reborn.  
Tonight.. I became an artist.

[dramatic interlude]

Industrial government strength adhesives which are not available to the general public, suck ass when they bond to your skin.  :/

I guess they don't want idiots like me using them.

<i>;Steve-0
<b>I want to breathe smoke

First I would like to say that out of all the "cliqs" I have associated with in the past, this is by far the best and most favorite I have ever had the privalage to be with.  All of you make me feel so comfortable and its so easy for me to open up and express my true feelings and personality.  I've never really done that before now and it feels great.  I don't need to act so fake around you like I have done in the past.  

However..

I think I am loosing something about myself.  I don't really know what it is, but it bothers me. What I am asking for is real simple.  I guess this is kind of sterotypical, but I want the truth.

When you first met me what was your first impression of me?
Was this first impression correct or incorrect?
Have I changed since you first met me and if so, how?

Thank you, if everybody would comment I would greatly appreciate it.  And dont be shy.  

<i>;Steve-0

Okay, I haven't been on the net in awhile so I decided that Im gonna update my journal. Now here is the thing, I have alot of stuff to put in this entry and alot of it shouldnt be mixed into one entry, but Im gonna do it anyway because I'm Mo'Fuggin god damn it. Just try to excuse the blasphemy. THOUGHTS ON WAR AND THE STATE OF THIS COUNTRY... Last night while I was at work, my friend Jack told me that he saw what he descirbed as an "Iraqi" standing outside of the store and it scared the hell out of him. Im guessing it probaby wasn't an Iraqi, but none the less, probably someone of the Islamic faith. Later that night, the muslim guy who cleans the trash came by, now keep in mind that he doesnt speak a word of english, infact, the only thing he can say is "hey buddy". I don't know his real name, so we just call him "hey buddy" seeing that is all he ever says. So anyway, this guy Jack goes up to 'Buddy' and says "Hey, I saw one of your friends standing outside earlier. Whats going on, you guys planning somthing?" Buddy proceeds to give nervous laugh and walks away. This scares me. I would also like to state that I have nothing but complete respect for the Islamic faith. As some of you may know, I have an uncle who is from Jordan. Not to mention that I took a course on Islam last semester, I know more about it than the adverage "American Pig". In addition, this morning I found out the my cousin is no longer being shipped to Kuwait next month. No, instead he is being shipped to Iraq on Thursday. :/ Yay. Go war! WRESTLEMANIA XIX PREDICTIONS & SYNONPSIS... Just keep in mind that I havent had a chance to watch RAW or Smackdown in the past few months on a regular basis, so I have NO idea what the fuck is going on anymore. I just got the card from wrestlemania.com Stone Cold Steve Austin vs. The Rock Rock is a bad guy? WTF when did this happen? And why the hell is Stone Cold back? Didnt he get arrested for pulling an OJ Simpson or something? Anyway, this is basically gonna be a remake of the Wrestlemania XV main event, except its not for the title. I give props to The Rock for goin heel again.. (I like him better that way >:) and also for jobbing to the Hurricane the other week.. yeah I saw that Rocky. Im expecting Stone Cold to win this one after overcomming somekind of interference. Bischoff probably, but I did hear roumers of Goldberg. Winner:Stone Cold Hollywood Hulk Hogan vs. Vince McMahon I hope Hogan does his trademark moonsault! Lol. Winner: Who the fuck cares as long as SOMEBODY has a stroke. WWE RAW HEAVYWEIGHT CHAMPIONSHIP MATCH Triple H (c) vs. Booker T This is way to predictable. Im guessing Triple H will parade around for a friggin hour with his "Evolution" Stable consisting of Ric Flair, Batista and Randy Orton (boo!). Batista is the fucking man, he should be in a match, not H. Then Steiner will probably involved someway or another with Booker T. Triple H, being the no sell aristocrat that he is simply will NOT job to the Booker man. Never. And if Booker does somehow win the title it'll be in a cheap way. I wish that nigga would do a spin-a-rooni on H's fat ass. Winner:Triple H & Evolution WWE SMACKDOWN HEAVYWEIGHT CHAMPIONSHIP MATCH Kurt Angle (c) vs. Brock Lesnar Holy fuckin splooge! This is gonna be a great match, possibly match of the night. Both are deserving of being in this match, they're great athletes. And unlike alot of people on the card *cough*Triple H*cough*.. they both have somthing called TALENT. Its hard to say who is gonna win, but Im guessing Lesnar since Angle has been holding the title since November. Winner: Brock Lesnar Chris Jericho vs. Shawn Michaels Jericho is the fuckin man, and Michales uses to be the man, but then he broke his back, retired and came back to action very recently. In other words.. HBK doesnt know when to DIE! I hope Jericho cleans his fucking clock. WINNER:Chris Jerichof The Undertaker & Nathan Jones vs. Big Show & A-Train This woud be a great match minus everybody except Nathan Jones. Taker is too damn old. Show is a heart attack waiting to happen. ATrain needs to shave his back. No way Taker is loosing his win streak at Wrestlemaia. WINNER: Undertaker & Nathan Jones WWE SMACKDOWN TAG TEAM CHAMPIONSHIP MATCH Los Guererros vs. Team Angle (c) vs. Chris Benoit & Rhyno WTF? I don't even know who the hell Team Angle is, but they have the titles. I think they're the two Ametur fags who hang out with Kurt Angle. Whatever. GO0000000000000000000000RRRRE! splooge. WINNER: Benoit & Rhyno WWE RAW TAG TEAM CHAMPIONSHIP MATCH Kane & Rob Van Dam vs. Lance Storm & Cheif Morely (c?) vs. The Dudley Boyz What happened to Regal? I dont even know if him and Storm are still the champs or not. And wrestlemania.com did a hell of a job explaining this match for me. It says Kane and RVD vs. Storm and Morely with the Dudley Boyz. Does that mean the Dudleyz are just gonna be there to watch or are they actually in the match? Who knows, who cares. This one is easy. WINNER: Kane & Rob Van Dam WWE CRUISERWEIGHT CHAMPIONSHIP MATCH Matt Hardy v1.0 (c?) vs. Rey Mysterio Jr Since when does Matt Hardy qualify as a Cruiserweight? Im not even sure if he is even the champ, but Im guessing he is seeing that Mysterio just came back. Mysterio's got this one unfortunately for Matt. WINNER:Rey Rey WWE WOMEN'S CHAMPIONSHIP Victoria (c) vs. Trish Stratus vs. Jazz Once again... who cares. WINNER: Nick Hart *SPECIAL ATTRACTION* THE SYNDICATE BATTLE ROYAL FEATURING... IN NO PATICULAR ORDER Tom "The Butcher" The Beast They Call Kuhn Timmay Kippy Nick "Child Of Satan" Hart Mark "Der Furher" Lombardi and of course... THE DELI MAN!!!!!!!!11 WINNER: All of a sudden, Spike Dudely comes out of nowhere and POWERBOMBS KUHN! Lombardi calls on his Ghestapo bodyguards to clean house. Meanwhile Tom is playing with his swords infront of the announce booth and making obscene gestures to the crowd. Timmay is distracting the referee while Nick humps Kippy. Deli Man is on a turnbuckle smoking a butt. Then Scott Steiner comes out and kills everybody. The end. SYSTEM OF A DOWN;Boom! Okay, trying to clear this up...

I should have been more clear in my last entry.  The pedistol comment wasnt' about you tim, it was about KUHN. The reason?  Lets just say that I know when people are talking about me behind my back in a negative context and I don't appreciate it.  Not to mention, I dont enjoy being waked up in the high school parking lot to a Kuhn humping my car, and then biching me out, then blowng me off later that day.

Not to mention the fact that he brought Jameson with him.  

Sorry for any misunderstanding.  

As for the whole "mentos" comment, I could personally give two shits.  Tim, you were with me when Lombardi was giving me shit too, it didnt bother me.  I didnt over react with that comment, I just shruged it off, possibly said "fuck you", can't really remember.  Fuck is every other word out of my mouth to begin with, so I don't know why you would take offense to it if you know me.  If you still think I overeacted, the I guess Im sorry for that, but whatever.  

And lets not talk about hypocrites right now *cough*kippy*cough*.

Ok, im done.

<i>;<s>Steve-0</s> Jesus

People need to take a look around, get off the fucking pedistol and come back down to reality.  

ASAP!

Because when you finally fall, your gonna hit your ass <b>HARD.<b>

You know who you are.

<i>;Steve-0

Peking and Moscow don't have anything beautiful yet." ;Andy Warhol Things piss me off today that cause me to want to break some skulls. Or rather, have my own skull broken. Either way, it would feel a hell of alot better. Thats how I felt around the middle of the day anyway. After I got home from work I tryed to relax a little bit, but I couldnt. So I just started reading. It relaxed me. I took away all of my stress, even if it was just for a little while. It felt good. I think Im gonna go destroy some art work. ;Steve-0 p r o v a L o n e [z] the Trotsky to your Lenin

I have the entire day off today. For that, you can thank the Rock, he's my number 1 nigga.  I covered for him last night, so I get today off.  Don't even know what Im gonna do today.  I talked to Boris last night, and him, Tim and Kuhn want to hang out.  Whenever Cait gets back Im gonna do somthing with her if she can.  We were gonna rent Basquiet.

Its about Jean Michelle Basquiet and Andy Warhol.

Its not a fag movie.

It really isnt.

Sure, Andy Warhol was gay and so is David Bowie, but still.

Urban art = provaLone

I was awakened early this morning by my boss, who asked me to come in to work today.  I replied.. "no...click."  Then I went back to sleep.

Around noon I went to the mall with Cait.  We rented Signs and hung out, then I dropped her off at her friend's birthday party.

Then I ate a meatball sub.

Around 7:00 I was sitting in the Roche Bros parking lot, after buying cigarettes and more lottery tickets.  I am now addicted to the Massachusettes state lottery. (Does that count as a tax write off?)  I called Kuhn and then met up with him at the mall.  Everybody was there.. Kuhn, Tom, Nick, Tim, Boris, Jackie, Amber, Shaker and Hewie.  Then we go to TGI fridays and I ordered dinner (forgetting that I had already eaten.)  I wasnt hungry when I got it, so I ate half and gave Nick the rest.  Then I went outside and had a cigarette and talked to Cait on the phone.  After TGI, we all went to Amber's house for a bit.  Then I left everybody because I was tired.  It is weird being the first person to leave.. Im usually the last.  I hate it too because like Dave Attel once said... "All of the fun stuff happens like 10 minutes AFTER you leave."  Well fuck it.. today was a good day.  I was extremely jovial for some odd reason.  I probably didnt really show it too much.. seeing that I have no emotions.. but that my friends is another story.

G'night.

<i>;Steve-0

Until the blood runs clear... So do as I ask Please. Don't stop. Just please don't stop. Not until... The blood runs clear. When Dreams Become Nightmares I sit alone as I do every night not sleeping or dreaming just comprehending the meaning of life. I think and I ponder Just for a bit then I look in the mirror and I bite my lip. I can't see myself. I am not there. Nobody. Nothing. I am ashamed. What have I become? My dreams have become nightmares.

I fear that my insomnia is returning.  I think Im gonna see another doctor about this one some time soon.  

I had a brief discussion with Tom tonight.  It felt good to get my thoughts out to him.  About everything.  And I am glad he believes and supports me on one such matter.

There are still things that I am trying to grasp onto and deal with.  Its hard and it worries me.  I want to make everything work out, and I hope it will.  I am almost certain it will.  I just haven't been in this situation in such a long time.  Its still hard for me.

And its strange, because the little things that would seem so insignifigant to other people make me feel so much better.

<i>;Steve-0

Quote of the night... "It's bishops all the way down" ;Tom Walsh Today was good. Picked up Nick and Kevin from school, then went and got Cait in Mansfield and went to an art supply store in Avon. That was fun, I was in a state of euvora for about a 1/2 hour. Then me and Cait hung out at her house for a little while, she convinced me to call in sick to work. After that I went and picked up Tim, met up with Tom, Kuhn and Kippy and thats about it. Drove Tom home and my tire shit itself about a mile from my house (boo!). Tomorrow seems to be even more interesting... Getting up early so I can change my god damn tire. Then Im picking up Tom, Kuhn and Kippy and we're getting McDonalds breakfast. I'd imagine we'll probably meet up with Tim and Nick at some point. Then I might be dropping off everybody at the mall and I go to work. Eh, whatever. At least I have Saturday off, and Im going to the movies with Cait. I hate writing about my god damn daily plans in my livejournal. It sounds so.. boring? Cliche? Uncreative? Yeah, whatever. It's funny how only a few short weeks ago I was constantly feeling like shit.. and now Im so... happy? What have I done to myself? ;Steve-0 Deli Man Extrodinaire
